ðŸ“– Summary: ClickVisual is a lightweight, browser-based platform designed for log analytics and visualization on ClickHouse. It offers features such as visual query dashboards, support for raw logs, percentage display for specified fields, and a VS Code style configuration board for Fluent-bit. It also supports easy deployment with Kubernetes and authentication via GitHub and GitLab.
